actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require MedPAC and MACPAC to biennially conduct a coordinated review and analysis of Medicare and Medicaid policy with respect to dually eligible beneficiaries, and to jointly submit recommendations for policy changes, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Coordinating Dual Eligible Recommendations Act

This bill requires the Medicare Payment Advisory Commission and the Medicaid and Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) Payment and Access Commission to jointly submit a biennial report on Medicare and Medicaid with respect to dually eligible beneficiaries, including information relating to finances, utilization, and coordination of services.

titles.title: A bill to require MedPAC and MACPAC to biennially conduct a coordinated review and analysis of Medicare and Medicaid policy with respect to dually eligible beneficiaries, and to jointly submit recommendations for policy changes, and for other purposes.
